metadata.name: The women of 14 countries
metadata.description:
The women of 14 countries are not only a symbol of ancient art, but also a symbol of endurance, they kept their art in the heart of darkness for centuries, like a big secret, they have taught their daughters to fight their laughter and cries, the story Romantic. They planned their becoming in the weave of threads made of mother's hair, woven and woven in different colors until today, the story of carpets and tiles chest to chest of girls who are as authentic and special as a beautiful Iranian carpet, but behind the fog of soldiers' cruelty. The darkness of their hair went to Taraj many times. The tiles on the walls of the houses and the carpets made by these women are proof of the yoke they have been subjected to.
It has been silent for centuries in the corner of the pixel to the tiles and carpets that they weaved and designed for love.
